name: Coyote
description: An open source image annotation app and API to enable the distributed annotation of museum images

scripts.postdeploy: bin/rake RAILS_ENV=production db:create db:migrate db:test:prepare db:seed

RAILS_ENV.description: The name of the environment we should run the app in

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

COYOTE_SEED_USER_PASSWORD.description: The initial password used for the first Coyote admin user
